duration.description: The time it takes for the slider to move once, in ms
duration.description_zh: 滑块移动一次所需的时间，单位ms

:list.description: An array of tags with elements as objects, e.g. [{name: 'recommended'}]
:list.description_zh: 标签数组，元素为对象，如[{name: '推荐'}]

activeStyle.description: menu when selecting the style of the time

inactiveStyle.description: The style of the menu when it is not selected

lineBgSize.description: The slider background shows the size, which is used when the slider background is set to the picture
lineBgSize.description_zh: 滑块背景显示大小，当滑块背景设置为图片时使用

itemStyle.description: The style of the menu item

current.description: The index of the currently selected tag

keyName.description: The name of the key read from the list element object
keyName.description_zh: 从list元素对象中读取的键名

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when a tag is clicked
events.params: index: 标签索引值，item: 传入的其他值

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the tag index is changed (not triggered when disalbed)
events.description_zh: 标签索引改变时触发(disalbed时不会触发)
events.params: index: 标签索引值，item: 传入的其他值
